name: part_012
file: tmp_【 #さくらみこ3D新衣装 】ゲストあり！3D新衣装お披露目LIVE ⧸ New outfit LIVE【ホロライブ⧸さくらみこ】 [jYQdvWQ20O0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Sakura Miko performs her song 'Ashita Hanatachi' on a stage with cherry blossom and neon aesthetics.
The stream ends with a static card featuring the new outfit and text.

subtitles.original: 寄りなす隙間に流れ
subtitles.english: Flowing through the gaps gathered together,

subtitles.original: 大地にのみ込まれてゆく
subtitles.english: It is swallowed by the earth.

subtitles.original: やさしげに香る徒花
subtitles.english: A transient flower with a gentle fragrance,

subtitles.original: しなやかに佇むその姿
subtitles.english: Standing there so gracefully.

subtitles.original: 紡いだ瞳にほども
subtitles.english: In those spun eyes,

subtitles.original: 甘い秘めて空を担う
subtitles.english: Harboring sweetness and bearing the sky.

subtitles.original: 背を向けて逃げるがいいさ
subtitles.english: You might as well turn your back and run;

subtitles.original: 誰もあなたを責められはしない
subtitles.english: No one will be able to blame you.

subtitles.original: どうせいつかは消えゆく花を
subtitles.english: A flower that will eventually fade away,

subtitles.original: それでも空に立ち向かったわ
subtitles.english: But still, it faced the sky.

subtitles.original: 手折られることなく
subtitles.english: Without being plucked,

subtitles.original: 明日になれば
subtitles.english: When tomorrow comes,

subtitles.original: 花になるのか
subtitles.english: Will it become a flower?

subtitles.original: 星になるのか
subtitles.english: Will it become a star?

subtitles.original: 願いを叫べ命の限り
subtitles.english: Shout your wish with all your might,

subtitles.original: やがて想いは星を貫く
subtitles.english: And soon your feelings will pierce the stars.

subtitles.original: 長い短い時間の果てに
subtitles.english: At the end of time, long or short,

subtitles.original: あなたの生きた証はさあ
subtitles.english: The proof that you lived, well...

subtitles.original: 土を押し上げて明日芽を出し
subtitles.english: Will push up the soil and sprout tomorrow,

subtitles.original: やがて大きな花を咲かす
subtitles.english: And eventually bloom into a large flower.

subtitles.original: 背を向けて逃げるがいいさ
subtitles.english: You might as well turn your back and run;

subtitles.original: 誰もあなたを責められはしない
subtitles.english: No one will be able to blame you.

subtitles.original: どうせいつかは消えゆく花を
subtitles.english: A flower that will eventually fade away,

subtitles.original: それでも空に立ち向かったわ
subtitles.english: But still, it faced the sky.

subtitles.original: 手折られることなく
subtitles.english: Without being plucked,

subtitles.original: 明日になれば
subtitles.english: When tomorrow comes,

subtitles.original: やがて綻びな
subtitles.english: It will soon begin to bloom,

subtitles.original: 花を咲かせ
subtitles.english: Making the flowers bloom...

subtitles.original: アシタハナタチ
subtitles.english: Flowers of Tomorrow.

subtitles.original: さくらみこ新衣装お披露目LIVE
subtitles.english: Sakura Miko New Outfit Reveal LIVE
